thread.title: GDP grows at 7% in Q3; full year growth retained at 7.1%
thread.title_full: GDP grows at 7% in Q3; full year growth retained at 7.1%

author: PTI
title: GDP grows at 7% in Q3; full year growth retained at 7.1%
text:
February 28, 2017 18:42  58 IST more-in 
Indiaâ€™s economy expanded by 7% in the third quarter of this financial year, belying fears over the note ban and its impact on economic activity. The Central Statistics Office (CSO) has retained the growth projection for the current fiscal at 7.1%, as estimated in the first advance estimate in January. 
It has marginally revised upwards the GDP estimates for the first and the second quarters, to 7.2% and 7.4%, respectively.
